trans-unit.source: Represents a request for notification for a given command.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en forespørsel om varsling for en gitt kommando.

trans-unit.source: This class provides low-level access to the query notification services exposed by SQL Server 2005.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen gir lavt nivå tilgang til spørringen notification-tjenester som vises av SQL Server 2005.

trans-unit.source: For most applications the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> class provides a simpler way of using query notifications.
trans-unit.target: For de fleste programmer den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>klassen gir enklere ved bruk av spørringsvarsler.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need fine control over when notifications occur, or you need to customize the message data returned as part of a notification, the SqlNotificationRequest class is the one to use.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger bedre kontroll når varsler oppstå, eller du trenger å tilpasse meldingsdataene som ble returnert som en del av en varsling, er imidlertid klassen SqlNotificationRequest det som kan brukes.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"> </xref> klasse standardverdier.

trans-unit.source: If the default constructor is used to create a <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest> object, that instance must have its <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.UserData%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.Options%2A> properties initialized before assigning the object to a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object's <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Standardkonstruktøren brukes til å opprette en <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest>objektet, den forekomsten må ha den <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.UserData%2A>og <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.Options%2A>Egenskaper initialisert før du tilordner objektet som en <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objektets <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.Options%2A> </xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.UserData%2A> </xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest>

trans-unit.source: The default values used by the constructor are NULL (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for the <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.UserData%2A>, an empty string for the <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.Options%2A>, and zero for the <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.Timeout%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdiene for konstruktøren er NULL (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) for den <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.UserData%2A>, en tom streng for den <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.Options%2A>, og null for <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.Timeout%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.Timeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.Options%2A> </xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.UserData%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> class with a user-defined string that identifies a particular notification request, the name of a predefined SQL Server 2005 Service Broker service name, and the time-out period, measured in seconds.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"> </xref> klassen med en brukerdefinert streng som identifiserer en bestemt varsling forespørsel om navnet på en forhåndsdefinert SQL Server 2005 Service Broker-servicenavnet og tidsavbruddsperioden, målt i sekunder.

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows you to initialize a new <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest> instance, providing your own identifier, the SQL Server 2005 Service Broker service name, and a time-out value.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren gjør det mulig å initialisere en ny <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest>forekomsten gir en identifikator, SQL Server 2005 Service Broker-servicenavnet og verdien for tidsavbrudd.</xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains an application-specific identifier for this notification.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder en programspesifikk identifikator for dette varselet.

trans-unit.source: It is not used by the notifications infrastructure, but it allows you to associate notifications with the application state.
trans-unit.target: Det brukes ikke av varslinger-infrastruktur, men du kan knytte varsler tilstanden programmet.

trans-unit.source: The value indicated in this parameter is included in the Service Broker queue message.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt i denne parameteren er inkludert i Service Broker køen meldingen.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the Service Broker service name where notification messages are posted, and it must include a database name or a Service Broker instance GUID that restricts the scope of the service name lookup to a particular database.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder Service Broker tjenestenavnet der varslingsmeldinger posteres, og det må inneholde et databasenavn eller en forekomst av Service Broker GUIDEN som begrenser omfanget av tjenesten navnet lookup til en bestemt database.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the format of the `options` parameter, see <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.Options*>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om formatet på den `options` parameteren se <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.Options*>.</xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest.Options*>

trans-unit.source: The time, in seconds, to wait for a notification message.
trans-unit.target: Tid i sekunder å vente på en melding.

trans-unit.source: The value of the options parameter is NULL.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den options parameteren er NULL.

trans-unit.source: The options or userData parameter is longer than or the value in the timeout parameter is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Den options eller userData parameteren er lengre enn eller -verdi i den timeout parameteren er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SQL Server Service Broker service name where notification messages are posted.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på SQL Server Service Broker tjenesten der varslingsmeldinger posteres.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Options property has the following format: `service=<service-name>{;(local database=<database>|broker instance=<broker instance>)}` For example, if you use the service "myservice" in the database "AdventureWorks" the format is: `service=myservice;local database=AdventureWorks` The SQL Server Service Broker service must be previously configured on the server.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen alternativer har følgende format: `service=<service-name>{;(local database=<database>|broker instance=<broker instance>)}` er For eksempel hvis du bruker tjenesten "myservice" i databasen "AdventureWorks" formatet: `service=myservice;local database=AdventureWorks` for SQL Server Service Broker-tjenesten må konfigureres tidligere på serveren.

trans-unit.source: In addition, a Service Broker service and queue must be defined and security access granted as needed.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg en Service Broker-tjenesten og køen må være definert og sikkerheten for tilgang gitt som kreves.

trans-unit.source: See the SQL Server 2005 documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se SQL Server 2005-dokumentasjonen for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that contains the SQL Server 2005 Service Broker service name where notification messages are posted and the database or service broker instance GUID to scope the server name lookup.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>som inneholder SQL Server 2005 Service Broker tjenestenavnet hvor varslingsmeldinger posteres og databasen eller service broker forekomsten GUID skal være omfang oppslag for server-navnet.

trans-unit.source: The value is NULL.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er NULL.

trans-unit.source: The value is longer than <xref uid="langword_csharp_uint16.MaxValue" name="uint16.MaxValue" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er lengre enn <xref uid="langword_csharp_uint16.MaxValue" name="uint16.MaxValue" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how long SQL Server waits for a change to occur before the operation times out.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvor lenge SQL Server venter på en endring i forekomme innen før operasjonen blir tidsavbrutt.

trans-unit.source: After the time-out period expires, the notification is sent even if no change takes place.
trans-unit.target: Når tidsavbruddsperioden utløper, sendes meldingen selv om ingen endring finner sted.

trans-unit.source: The Timeout property defaults to the value set on the server.
trans-unit.target: Som standard Timeout-egenskapen til verdien som er angitt på serveren.

trans-unit.source: A signed integer value that specifies, in seconds, how long SQL Server waits for a change to occur before the operation times out.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall med fortegn-verdi som angir hvor lenge SQL Server venter på en endring i forekomme innen før operasjonen blir tidsavbrutt, i sekunder.

trans-unit.source: The value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an application-specific identifier for this notification.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en programspesifikk identifikator for dette varselet.

trans-unit.source: This value is not used by the notifications infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien brukes ikke av varslinger-infrastruktur.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is a mechanism that allows an application to associate notifications with application state.
trans-unit.target: Det er bare en mekanisme som tillater at et program knytte varsler programtilstanden.

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the UserData property is included in the SQL Server 2005 queue message.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt i egenskapen vedvarende er inkludert i SQL Server 2005 køen meldingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the application-specific identifier for this notification.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdien for programspesifikk identifikatoren for dette varselet.

trans-unit.source: The value is longer than <xref uid="langword_csharp_uint16.MaxValue" name="uint16.MaxValue" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er lengre enn <xref uid="langword_csharp_uint16.MaxValue" name="uint16.MaxValue" href=""> </xref>.
